Fall(ish) Frivolities.tagLine: (Yall know we are just gearing up for Halloween right?)

1.title: I'm a Cosmotologist
1.description: Vodka, Devil-made cranberry-rosemary shrub, lime, seltzer.
1.tagLine: Rosemary stars in this light, bright, elixir of the cosmos.

2.title: Lovely Norma Jennings
2.description: Bourbon, Devil-made apple pie syrup, Olorosso sherry, black walnut bitters.
2.tagLine: This must be where pies go when they die

3.title: Spill The Tea
3.description: Espolon blanco tequila, Norden Aquavit, Devil-made red tea syrup, yuzu, lime, ginger beer.
3.tagLine: French red tea blends beautifully with the citrus of yuzu and lime (the tequila doesn’t hurt either!)

4.title: Bikini Atoll 1943
4.description: Plantation Pineapple Rum, Devil-made Tropical Vermouth, Linchpin Aperitivo, saline, Angostura bitters.
4.tagLine: It's all booze and yet it's light and fruity, how do we do it?!

5.title: BEETlejuice
5.description: Beet-infused Agricole Rhum JM, Velvet Falernum, lime, simple, orange bitters, egg white.

6.title: Bananadictine
6.description: Jameson, Dolin Blanc Vermouth, banana-infused Benedictine, rich syrup, Peychaud's bitters, Pernod Absinthe rinse.
6.tagLine: Don't say we're bananas for this, be better than that…WE'RE BANANAS FOR THIS B-A-N-A-N-A-S! Dammit…

7.title: The Spice Melange,
7.description: Reposado tequila, Devil-made Garam Masala pumpkin syrup, lemon, coconut, Angostura bitters, orange flower.
7.tagLine: Finally, a pumpkin spice drink that is anything but basic…

8.title: Ses Youz,
8.description: Plymouth gin, Pierre Ferrand Dry Curacao, pineapple, lime, sesame syrup, Angostura bitters, sesame oil.
8.tagLine: It's like if a perfect daiquiri was made with gin, orange liqueur, and had a beguiling sesame kick, so not like a daiquiri at all I suppose…

9.title: Dirty Tom
9.description: Gin, Dolin Dry Vermouth, Devil-made tomato brine, soy sauce, simple.
9.tagLine: Dirty martini, but make it tomato; we did it again but better!

10.title: Dr. Puffer
10.description: Vodka, Amaretto, lemon, simple, egg white, cream, Modelo Especial.
10.tagLine: It's as unhinged as the people that created it! Ramos Gin Fizz style ‘puff’ ‘can take up to 10 minutes to make but usually faster; we don’t mind, promise; Sergio is going to make it anyways.

11.title: Nice Melons
11.description: Midori, Cognac, acid-adjusted orange juice, pineapple, egg white.
11.tagLine: It shouldn’t be this good, why are these melons so nice!

1.title: We Can’t Elope
1.description: Cantaloupe infused Aviation gin, lemon, mint, agave.

2.title: Whiteless Russian
2.description: Flor de Cana 7yr Rum, Perc coffee liqueur, Meletti, BRIO coffee, demerara sugar, lemon, whey.
2.tagLine: Rum milk punch version of The Dude’s preferred beverage. It abides. Oh man does it abide!

3.title: Arcana Bitternica
3.description: Espolon blanco tequila, Velvet Falernum, Vexia, lime, grapefruit, Angostura bitters, Q tonic water, citrus salt.
3.tagLine: Burlington homie-made fernet (Vexia) shines in this bittersweet sipper.

4.title: Pachamama
4.description: Pisco, coconut, lime, Peychaud’s bitters, absinthe-coconut whipped cream, rose buds.

5.title: Kevin
5.description: Buffalo Trace bourbon, Yellow Chartreuse, Metcalf’s Peach Liqueur, chicory pecan bitters, Peychaud’s bitters, cava.
5.tagLine: What started out as a riff on a Seelbach became so unhinged that we named it after a man-eating (allegedly) seal.

6.title: Kilt in the Breeze
6.description: Speyburn 10yr Single Malt Scotch, pineapple, lime, chipotle maple, orange bitters.

7.title: Yellow Stone Witch
7.description: Plymouth gin, Strega, peach, Angostura bitters, vanilla, cava.
7.tagLine: Peaches, gin, and the witches brew (Strega) come together for something truly delightful with just the right amount of bubbles.

8.title: She’s Made of Oak
8.description: Rittenhouse Rye, Underberg, Bigallet China-China, chipotle maple syrup, Angostura bitters, oak smoke.

9.title: New Calendar
9.description: Jalapeno infused Banhez Mezcal, Green Chartreuse, ginger, jalapeno, lime, citrus salt

10.title: Sam Rum Stir Thang
10.description: Cocchi Rosa, Plantation Pineapple Rum, Amaro Ciociaro, Wray & Nephew overproof rum, Angostura bitters, orange bitters, lime zest.

11.title: Chilled Monkey Brains
11.description: Speyburn 10yr scotch, Amaretto, grapefruit, coconut, lime, Campari spray.
11.tagLine: It’s juicy, it’s tropical, it comes on crushed ice, but most importantly it’s served in a skull…

12.title: No Rest For The Wicked (on draft!)
12.description: Mezcal, Contratto Bitter, Perc coffee liqueur, Sweet Vermouth, Devil-made crème de cacao, mole bitters.

Atonements.tagLine: (It's your normal life, you just aren't hungover)

1.title: Mamma Ghia (how could I resist you?)
1.description: Ghia non-alcoholic aperitif, New London Light n/a gin, acid adjusted orange juice, agave, lemon.

2.title: Hibiscus Hijinks
2.description: Seedlip Grove 42 Citrus, hibiscus syrup, fresh lemon juice, seltzer.

3.title: The City Special
3.description: Devil-made cinnamon & BRIO coffee syrup, condensed milk, vanilla, star anise, Mexican Coca-Cola.

4.title: Spritz-SIN the Night Away
4.description: Pentire Coastal, rosemary, blood orange, Q tonic.

5.title: Wrong Island Iced Tea
5.description: Pathfinder 'Amaro', Pentire Seaward 'spirit', Wilfred's NA Bitter, lemon, splash of Mexican Coca-Cola.

6.title: NArgarita
6.description: Pentire Adrift ‘spirit’, fresh lime juice, agave, citrus salt.
